questions.text: Who was not with Leo at his prepping for the Vice Presidential debate?
questions.explanation:
Donna.

	Josh and Lou were barking orders at Leo concerning how to handle the debates that contradicted each other. Josh wasn't at the debate, but watched the tape that was made. After seeing the tape of the first debate prep, Josh destroyed the tape and told Leo the VCR ate it.

questions.text: After a picture of Helen's underwear showed up in a tabloid, did Donna tell Helen about her own underwear story?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Helen was humiliated by the picture of her thong and tattoo and Donna talked to her about it, but she didn't mention what happened to her in "The Leadership Breakfast".

questions.text: Who said, "I could kiss you, or you know not."
questions.explanation:
Josh.

	Josh was impressed by the way Leo was handling himself in the debate and he made this comment to Lou.

questions.text: What was Santos going to do when a Secret Service agent stopped him from doing it?
questions.explanation:
Getting the mail.

	The Secret Service agent stopped him before he got to the mailbox and informed him that the street needed to be shut down before he could get his mail and then his mail would be screened before coming to him.

questions.text: Where did Kate and Will have their first date?
questions.explanation:
His office.

	They shared a candlelit dinner in his office while they watched the Vice Presidential debate.

questions.text: What ailment did Santos' children have that no one wanted him to catch?
questions.explanation:
Cold.

	Helen informed Matt that both kids were sick after he had already hugged and kissed them. Then when he asked how she was doing, Helen said she was just getting over Ebola.

questions.text: Who was the first person that told Josh to chill?
questions.explanation:
Santos.

	Santos told Donna to give Josh this message, "to chill". Donna repeated to Josh what Santos had said and Josh asked her if she remembered that he was her boss. After hearing that Santos had told Donna to tell him that, Josh took it better. Donna told Josh she had wanted to tell him to chill for the last eight years.

questions.text: Annabeth used the name of which one of her animals as her computer password?
questions.explanation:
Cat.

	This was the first time viewers heard that Annabeth had an animal. Leo mentioned that she used the name of her cat as her computer password.

questions.text: When Josh called Toby, how long did Toby say it had been since Josh talked to him last?
questions.explanation:
Six weeks.

	Toby made a comment about how Josh had been calling every six weeks. Josh told Toby he would call again in six weeks and Toby mentioned that the phone call would be on Election day. Before they hung up, Josh asked Toby if D.C. allowed felons to vote.

questions.text: Who admitted to Annabeth that they leaked the story about Leo and his horrible debate preps?
questions.explanation:
Leo.

	After the debate, Leo told Annabeth that he called some reporters and used her e-mail address to get on the Internet and leak the story that he was doing horrible at his debate preps.
